content: I wanted to prove some basic closure properties of polytime operations, and I was wondering, why was Î± explicitly defined here when it is (both by a human reader and by lean4) inferrable? the file in question TMComputable.lean#L250
mathlib3#4048 is the pr that introduced it
Thanks for the blame-link - I was afraid that this was a leftover from a mathlib3-ism, but I'll ask: CCing @Pim Spelier
